title: Section Of A Sarong, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with continuous and discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Red silk sarong fragment with fine lines of green, blue, and yellow creating a plaid pattern. Small brocaded shapes interspersed on plain ground. Center field of brocaded eight-pointed flowers in silver within gold diamond lattice and surrounded by gold geometric border. Gold geometric border at one end, other end cut.

tombstone.epitaph:
Section Of A Sarong, early 20th century. Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with continuous and discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). 1974-9-11.
